attributes.review: This app ate my dog?? I was excited to stay up to date with the latest in politics and sign up for rallies, however as soon as I downloaded the app, my dog was gone. Just poofed out of thin air! My poor pooch is gone! I can’t believe trump would do such an awful thing!!!!😡😡😡😭😭😭
attributes.title: Ate my dog!

attributes.review: Hi my name is Anna Bor-Shawn, My friend Susan and Bertha recommended me this app during brunch  after we harassed some BLM protesters and I don't like it.😡😡😡 It started to glitch and it told my fish to drown.. 🥴🥴it is so insensitive my fish could have drowned because this app told it to👁👄👁i gladly deleted it but now its too late my fish drowned😔😔
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: I will NEVER AND I MEANNN NEVAVAAAAAA download this again just horrible as if we already didn’t have a racist,disrespectful, misleading , child - let me not go there either way ugh do not recommend didn’t even recommend before I downloaded the app 😒
attributes.title: Just horrible

attributes.review: The app is a disgrace to our country but at the same time it is created by the biggest disgrace the United States has had in a while(besides white supremacists). This app as well as trump and his trumpets make me embarrassed to me an American🤡. Let’s take this down please!
attributes.title: Best way to waste time

attributes.review: These was the worst app I ever got when I went in the app to see abt out orange ugly disgusting present, 50 ninjas came in my house and tried to rob my phone so they can rate this app a 5 star but little do they know I did karate for 20 years, the moral of this story is rate this app a 1 Star.
attributes.title: Eww

attributes.review: I opened the app and it asked for personal information I was disgusted I tell you. How can you just ask for my personal information this is why I’m not going to the rally but will still reserve 40 seats. Thank you for time.
attributes.title: No.

attributes.review: I have many problems with this app. First off, it is endorsing a sexual predator (Donald Trump). I gagged all over my child when I opened the app to see a picture of his putrid face!!! My child is now in critical condition in the ER because he accidentally saw Donald’s face when I opened the app!!! DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: This app has been a very long time to do the work and it’s not really good for my family to be able to do anything else and I don’t want it to be here anymore because off all the trouble I see. Very bad!!
attributes.title: Terrible!!! 👎

attributes.review: ive never been more disappointed in my life, first of all i open to all to see a human sized puff cheeto😔 and never in my life have i gotten so sick, i’m talking about that diarrhea throwing up stuff. while i was throwing i pooled on myself all because i saw that THING ON MY PHONE.🤢🤢🤢🤢
attributes.title: THIS IS TERRIBLE 😾 disgusting 🤢

attributes.review: baby, this is not it. i downloaded this to keep track of my all time favorite candidate!! but instead i was greeting by a giant man with a bad tan. my son was right behind me. i now have to tell him that the “cheeto man” wont come out of his closet. anyway i’m now a democratic leftist that hopes trump get voted out of office. FREE BARRON
